personal.name: Sandali
personal.title: Creative Developer & Designer
personal.bio: Passionate about creating beautiful, functional, and user-centered digital experiences. I love turning complex problems into simple, beautiful, and intuitive designs.

projects.title: E-Commerce Platform
projects.description: A full-stack e-commerce platform built with React, Node.js, and MongoDB. Features include user authentication, product management, shopping cart, and payment integration.

projects.title: Task Management App
projects.description: A collaborative task management application with real-time updates, drag-and-drop functionality, and team collaboration features.

projects.title: Weather Dashboard
projects.description: A beautiful weather dashboard that displays current weather conditions and forecasts using OpenWeatherMap API with animated weather icons.

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: A responsive portfolio website built with React and Tailwind CSS, featuring smooth animations and modern design principles.

experience.title: Frontend Developer
experience.description: Developed and maintained responsive web applications using React and modern JavaScript frameworks.

experience.title: UI/UX Designer
experience.description: Created user-centered designs by understanding business requirements and user feedback.
